column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jibzy - Thank you for bringing this to my attention. I spoke with our staff to find out what happened
column2: and I apologize for the missteps. Please check your inbox for my private message. I hope this experience does not deter you from future visits. And if you do come through again
column3: please ask for me or any of our managers
column4: and they will make sure your experience is vastly superior to this one. Thank you again.
